name: Project Blackwing
description:
YOU ARE ABOARD THE STAR DESTROYER VECTOR DRIFTING IN THE EMPTINESS OF SPACE. THE CHEMICAL "BLACKWING" HAS INFECTED THE CREW WITH SOME ILLNESS THAT IS MAKING THEM CRAZY
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Throughout this game you are a Storm Trooper trapped on a Imperial Star Destroyer roaming with the infected, The "Blackwing" Virus was somehow released around the ship causing your fellow troopers to get infected and become the UNDEAD, You must survive by completing the objectives below, You are the last hope to inform the Empire of the virus outbreak and stop its spread.
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

1. GET TO THE CONTROL ROOM
2. OPEN HANGAR BAY CONTROL ROOM DOOR
3. (OPTIONAL) OPEN MEDBAY DOOR
3. GET TO HANGARBAY CONTROL ROOM AND OPEN THE ENTRANCE TO THE HANGAR
4. INSIDE THE HANGAR OPEN THE BLASTER DOOR
5. ESCAPE

Controls

W - Forward
A - Left
S - Back
D - Right
Space - Jump
E - Interact
Left Mouse Button - Shoot

(This is a student project and made for an assignment)
This is also my first ever game so please expect bugs!
